signals.problem_statement: The shared inbox setup does not allow the executive assistant to filter emails properly, leading to clutter in the inbox.
signals.customer_ask: I want my executive assistant to see all the same emails that are coming into my Gmail inbox.
signals.suggested_solution: Implement a method to auto-close or filter emails to avoid clutter.
signals.context: 10 people on the team using three shared inboxes.

signals.problem_statement: The current plan limits the number of users and mailboxes, which restricts team access to the product.
signals.customer_ask: I don't want to upgrade because it doubles the cost.
signals.suggested_solution: Provide a more affordable upgrade option or a way to manage within the current limits.
signals.context: 10 people on the team using three shared inboxes.

signals.problem_statement: There is no way to automate the handling of duplicate late payment notices from vendors.
signals.customer_ask: Is there a way for these automations to catch duplicate late payment notices?
signals.suggested_solution: Develop a feature that can identify and filter out duplicate emails based on subject lines.
signals.context: 10 people on the team using three shared inboxes.

signals.problem_statement: The customer lacks a straightforward way to export data into Google Sheets for tracking team performance.
signals.customer_ask: I'd love to have somebody quickly set it up so that I can just dump that data into a Google sheet automatically.
signals.suggested_solution: Create an automated export feature that integrates with Google Sheets.
signals.context: 10 people on the team using three shared inboxes.
